mapper.sql: A.ID, A.DEVICE_CODE, A.DEVICE_NAME, A.DEVICE_SPEC, A.CATEGORY_ID, A.LOCATION_ID, A.LOCATION_NAME, A.USE_DEPARTMENT_ID, A.MANAGE_DEPARTMENT_ID, A.MANAGE_PERSON_IDS, A.MANAGE_PERSON_NAME, A.SUPPLIER_ID, A.MAITAIN_CYCLE, A.TIME_AFTER_MAINTAIN, A.TOTAL_RUNNING_TIME, A.SPECIAL_STATUS, A.BARCODE, A.PRDUCE_DATE, A.ASSETS_CODE, A.ENABLE_DATE, A.STATUS, A.ASSETS_COST, A.ASSETS_RESIDUAL, A.DEPRECIATION_ALGORITHM, A.DEPRECIATION_RATE, A.DEPRECIATION_YEARS, A.MAP_DISPLAY, A.SMALL_TYPE, A.CREATE_ID, A.CREATOR, A.CREATE_DATE, A.UPDATE_ID, A.UPDATOR, A.UPDATE_DATE, A.HPID, A.DISCIPINES_CODE, A.EXTENDED1

select , sub.NAME SUB_NAME, sub.CODE SUB_CODE, ISNULL(ele.TOTAL-ele.INCREMENTAL,0) LAST_TOTAL, ele.TOTAL, ele.INCREMENTAL, ele.COLLECT_TIME FROM NH_ELECTRIC_METER ele INNER JOIN DEVICE A ON A.EXTENDED1 = ele.bit_no INNER JOIN DEVICE_CATEGORY DC ON A.CATEGORY_ID = DC.ID AND DC.CATEGORY_CODE = #{categoryCode} LEFT JOIN NH_SUB_SYSTEM_INFO sub ON A.DISCIPINES_CODE = sub.STANDARD_CODE

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM NH_ELECTRIC_METER ele INNER JOIN DEVICE A ON A.EXTENDED1 = ele.bit_no INNER JOIN DEVICE_CATEGORY DC ON A.CATEGORY_ID = DC.ID AND DC.CATEGORY_CODE = #{categoryCode} LEFT JOIN NH_SUB_SYSTEM_INFO sub ON A.DISCIPINES_CODE = sub.STANDARD_CODE
mapper.select: select , sub.NAME SUB_NAME, sub.CODE SUB_CODE, ISNULL(ele.TOTAL-ele.INCREMENTAL,0) LAST_TOTAL, ele.TOTAL, ele.INCREMENTAL, ele.COLLECT_TIME FROM DEVICE A LEFT JOIN NH_SUB_SYSTEM_INFO sub ON A.DISCIPINES_CODE = sub.STANDARD_CODE LEFT JOIN NH_ELECTRIC_METER ele ON A.EXTENDED1 = ele.bit_no where a.ID = #{id}
mapper.sql:
select , sub.NAME SUB_NAME, sub.CODE SUB_CODE, ISNULL(ele.TOTAL-ele.INCREMENTAL,0) LAST_TOTAL, ele.TOTAL, ele.INCREMENTAL, ele.COLLECT_TIME FROM NH_ELECTRIC_METER ele INNER JOIN DEVICE A ON A.EXTENDED1 = ele.bit_no
and A.DISCIPINES_CODE like #{subCode}+'%'
INNER JOIN DEVICE_CATEGORY DC ON A.CATEGORY_ID = DC.ID AND DC.CATEGORY_CODE = #{categoryCode} LEFT JOIN NH_SUB_SYSTEM_INFO sub ON A.DISCIPINES_CODE = sub.STANDARD_CODE

sql.where:
A.ID = #{id} and A.DEVICE_CODE like '%'+#{deviceCode}+'%' and A.DEVICE_NAME like '%'+#{deviceName}+'%' and A.DEVICE_SPEC like '%'+#{deviceSpec}+'%' and
A.LOCATION_ID IN
#{item}
and
A.CATEGORY_ID =#{categoryId} and A.USE_DEPARTMENT_ID = #{useDepartmentId} and A.MANAGE_DEPARTMENT_ID = #{manageDepartmentId} and A.MANAGE_PERSON_IDS like '%'+#{managePersonIds}+'%' and A.MANAGE_PERSON_NAME like '%'+#{managePersonName}+'%' and A.SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId} and A.MAITAIN_CYCLE = #{maitainCycle} and A.TIME_AFTER_MAINTAIN = #{timeAfterMaintain} and A.TOTAL_RUNNING_TIME = #{totalRunningTime} and A.SPECIAL_STATUS = #{specialStatus} and A.BARCODE like '%'+#{barcode}+'%' and A.ASSETS_CODE like '%'+#{assetsCode}+'%' and A.PRDUCE_DATE = '#{prduceDate}' and A.ENABLE_DATE = '#{enableDate}' and A.STATUS = #{status} and A.ASSETS_COST = #{assetsCost} and A.ASSETS_RESIDUAL = #{assetsResidual} and A.DEPRECIATION_ALGORITHM = #{depreciationAlgorithm} and A.DEPRECIATION_RATE = #{depreciationRate} and A.DEPRECIATION_YEARS = #{depreciationYears} and A.MAP_DISPLAY = #{mapDisplay} and A.SMALL_TYPE like '%'+#{smallType}+'%' and A.CREATE_ID = #{createId} and A.CREATOR like '%'+#{creator}+'%' and A.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} and A.UPDATE_ID = #{updateId} and A.UPDATOR like '%'+#{updator}+'%' and A.UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate} and ele.COLLECT_TIME >=#{startTime} and ele.COLLECT_TIME <dateadd(day,1,#{endTime}) and 1=1

mapper.select: select ID from DEVICE where EXTENDED1 = #{bitNo}
mapper.sql:
select count(1) FROM NH_ELECTRIC_METER ele INNER JOIN DEVICE A ON A.EXTENDED1 = ele.bit_no
and A.DISCIPINES_CODE like #{subCode}+'%'
INNER JOIN DEVICE_CATEGORY DC ON A.CATEGORY_ID = DC.ID AND DC.CATEGORY_CODE = #{categoryCode} LEFT JOIN NH_SUB_SYSTEM_INFO sub ON A.DISCIPINES_CODE = sub.STANDARD_CODE
mapper.select:
select
,dpu.NAME USE_DEPARTMENT_NAME,sub.NAME SUB_NAME
#order($_parameter.condition,"a.id")
from DEVICE A INNER JOIN DEVICE_CATEGORY DC ON A.CATEGORY_ID = DC.ID AND DC.CATEGORY_CODE = @{_parameter.condition.barcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN HO_DEPARTMENT dpu ON A.USE_DEPARTMENT_ID = dpu.ID LEFT JOIN NH_SUB_SYSTEM_INFO sub ON A.DISCIPINES_CODE = sub.STANDARD_CODE

select
,dpu.NAME USE_DEPARTMENT_NAME,sub.NAME SUB_NAME from DEVICE A INNER JOIN DEVICE_CATEGORY DC ON A.CATEGORY_ID = DC.ID AND DC.CATEGORY_CODE = @{_parameter.condition.barcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN HO_DEPARTMENT dpu ON A.USE_DEPARTMENT_ID = dpu.ID LEFT JOIN NH_SUB_SYSTEM_INFO sub ON A.DISCIPINES_CODE = sub.STANDARD_CODE
#order($_parameter.condition,"a.id")

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DEVICE A INNER JOIN DEVICE_CATEGORY DC ON A.CATEGORY_ID = DC.ID AND DC.CATEGORY_CODE = @{_parameter.condition.barcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN HO_DEPARTMENT dpu ON A.USE_DEPARTMENT_ID = dpu.ID LEFT JOIN NH_SUB_SYSTEM_INFO sub ON A.DISCIPINES_CODE = sub.STANDARD_CODE
mapper.sql: #where() #set($_p = $_parameter.condition) 1=1 #if($_p.deviceCode && $_p.deviceCode!='') #set($_deviceCode='%' +$_p.deviceCode+ '%') and A.DEVICE_CODE like @{_deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #end #if($_p.deviceName && $_p.deviceName!='') #set($_deviceName='%' +$_p.deviceName+ '%') and A.DEVICE_NAME like @{_deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #end #if($_p.extended1 && $_p.extended1!='') #set($_extended1='%' +$_p.extended1+ '%') and A.EXTENDED1 like @{_extended1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #end #if($_p.discipinesCode && $_p.discipinesCode!='') #set($_discipinesCode='%' +$_p.discipinesCode+ '%') and A.DISCIPINES_CODE like @{_discipinesCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #end #if($_p.lstLocationId && $_p.lstLocationId.size()>0) #set($_lstLocationId =$_p.lstLocationId) and #repeat( $_lstLocationId $ids "," " A.LOCATION_ID IN (" ")" ) @{ids,jdbcType=BIGINT} #end #end #if($_p.lstDepartmentId && $_p.lstDepartmentId.size()>0) #set($_lstDepartmentId =$_p.lstDepartmentId) and #repeat( $_lstDepartmentId $ids "," " dpu.ID IN (" ")" ) @{ids,jdbcType=BIGINT} #end #end #end
